content: p 15 17 sl1 p2tog psso turn yarn onto dpns work i-cord until the cord row 11 k 14 16 sl1 ssk psso turn measures 10 or desired lenth bobble and break row 12 p 13 15 sl1 p2tog psso turn yarn row 13 k 12 14 sl1 ssk psso turn row 14 p 11 13 sl1 p2tog psso turn weave in all ends and gently block row 15 k to the end row 16 p to the end 18 22 sts remain hold remaining stitches on larger circ and break yarn neck ribbing using smaller needles with rs facing pu 16 18 sts k 18 22 sts from larger circ pu 16 18 sts 50 58 sts row 1 ws *p2 k2 repeat from * to last 2 sts p2 work in 2x2 rib as set until piece measures 1 from co edge ending with a ws row share your make i d love to see your version use the hastag #metasbonnet on instagram or upload it to ravelry this pattern is free for personal non-commercial use all images and instructions © the projectory 2018 please contact theprojectory@gmail com with any questions
